title: Software Engineer
desc: Building multi-platform applications for Android, iOS, & Web using the Flutter & ReactJs development frameworks.
Writing clear and reader-friendly code using. Documenting the entire usage process in detail for straightforward utilization and upgrading in the future.
Developing user interface components, widgets and implementing them by following well-known Flutter / ReactJs workflows and practices.
Collaborating with other developers to create, deploy, and maintain applications for different platforms.
Building, implementing, and managing product modules along with their sub-systems.
Testing products to remove bugs and any malfunctioning aspects.

title: Software Engineer
desc: Involved designing in web pages using HTML 5, CSS3, JavaScript, Bootstrap, ReactJs, MongoDB
